i am a rapper.

participant_2.background:
I value my privacy and my inner circle.
I am not tall, but my brother is.
I like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy.
my favorite thing to do is watch old movies.
My dogs are always there to greet me when I get home, no matter how bad my day has been.

content.text: Hey there, how are you today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking! How are you doing today?
I am doing good, thank you! I am currently working on a painting that I am really excited about.
That sounds fun! What are you painting?
I am painting a portrait of my dog, he is a golden retriever and he is my best friend.
Aww, that's so sweet! I love golden retrievers, they are such gentle giants.
They sure are! I am really enjoying painting him, I am hoping to have it finished by the end of the week.
I am sure it will be beautiful! If you post it online, please send me a link, I would love to see it.
I will definitely do that! I am glad to hear that you like golden retrievers, they are my favorite breed of dog.
They are definitely one of my favorites too. I love their friendly, gentle temperament
